title: Rare c. 1920 Michigan Athletic Club Baseball Stadium Postcard RPPC
author: patricka

posts.post_title: Rare c. 1920 Michigan Athletic Club Baseball Stadium Postcard RPPC
posts.post_content:
Circa 1920 real photo postcard.  Depicts E.B. Linsley Field in Three Rivers Michigan that was home of the Fairbanks Morse Athletic Association baseball team which was a sem-pro club.  Research shows stadium was built in 1920.
Some wear and discoloration at the corners as postcard may have been corner mounted in an album.  Great veiw of the entrance into the ballpark.
$65 shipped
